entries.journal_entry_description: A new pocket of high grade minerals has been located on the Burning Plains. The Mustafar Mining Company wants to get their crews into that area and extract those resources. The problem is that the pocket is near a kubaza beetle nest, and kubaza beetles are extremely aggressive when defending their nests. The company needs that nest of beetles eliminated before they can send their miners in. They have supplied you with a timed charge that you will need to drop into the nests.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Travel to the mining camp. There are several nests surrounding the camp that need to be destroyed. You can expect that the kubaza beetles will fiercely defend their nests.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Donko Jen needs you to place the charges on each of the kubaza beetle nests that surround his mining camp. He warned you that the beetles will send out their soldiers to defend the nests and that they need all be killed or they will rebuild the nests.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Destroy the Four Kubaza Beetle Nests
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The nests are destoyed but there is a chance that some of the beetles managed to get out. You must kill any remaining beetles in the area to avoid them being able to rebuild their nests.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Clean up Any Remaining Kubaza Beetles
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Donko Jen and report that the nest has been destroyed.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Find one of the nests that surround the miner's camp and place a charge on it. Once the charge is set, move away from the nest, or you might be caught in the blast. Be very careful, because this will really rile up the kubaza beetle soldiers, and you should expect to be attacked.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: You must kill any of the kubaza soldier beetles that manage to escape the blast. If you do not, they will rebuild the nest.
